workflow.name: Automated LinkedIn profile summaries with GPT-4o and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
Quickly transform any LinkedIn profile URL into a concise, AI‚Äëgenerated professional summary ‚Äî perfect for recruiters, sales teams, and hiring managers who need instant insights into prospects or candidates without manual research.

### How it works
- The workflow polls a Google Sheet for new or updated rows containing LinkedIn profile URLs.
- For each URL, the Real‚ÄëTime LinkedIn Scraper API (via RapidAPI) pulls experience and education sections.
- Extracted profile data is sent to OpenAI‚Äôs GPT model, which generates a clean, structured summary highlighting key strengths, career trajectory, and differentiators.
- The generated summary is written back into a new column in the same row of your Google Sheet for easy review and sharing.


### Set up steps
- Connect your Google account and select the spreadsheet + worksheet containing your list of LinkedIn URLs.
- Sign up for the Real‚ÄëTime LinkedIn Scraper API on RapidAPI, copy your API key, and add it to the workflow‚Äôs HTTP Request node.
- Insert your OpenAI API key credentials.
- Ensure your Google Sheet has one column for ‚Äúlinkedin_url‚Äù and create two empty columns named ‚Äúfull_name‚Äù and "summary" (or customize them based on your needs).
- Run a single row through the workflow to verify scraping accuracy and summary formatting, then turn on the workflow for continuous automation.


With this template, eliminate hours of manual profile review ‚Äî instantly gain actionable insights and focus on what really matters: building relationships and closing deals.

workflow.name: Automated LinkedIn Profile Summaries with GPT-4o and Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## Configuration needed!
In order to get LinkedIn profiles, you need API. We use Real-Time LinkedIn Scraper API from RapidAPI. 

[Get your API Key HERE](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/linkedin-data-api)

### Replace YOUR_API_KEY
### Setup your Google Sheets API Account

nodes.name: Combine each linkedin profile into single text
Summarize each profile using GPT model

values.prompt:
=Based on the following information about a person‚Äôs professional and educational background, generate a clear, concise summary that highlights their key accomplishments, current role, and academic credentials. Include their headline, major education achievements, and significant work experiences. The summary should provide a quick overview of their expertise and career trajectory.

Details:

Headline: [Insert Headline here]
Education: [List each education entry, including the institution, field of study, and the years attended]
Work Experience: [List each role, including the title, company name, and starting year]

The context is:

{{ $json.combinedText }}

Provide a summary that outlines the candidate‚Äôs current role, relevant academic background, and career progression in a professional tone.
The output text should be in plain text, without any additional formatting. Also, it should say any "Summary:" or "Headline:". Just text about the experience

CONSICE SUMMARY:

nodes.name: Tigger workflow when google sheets has new row added
Split results into multiple linkedin profiles
Update Google Sheets rows with summarization for each profile

value.full_name: ={{ $('Combine each linkedin profile into single text').item.json.fullName }}
value.linkedin_url: ={{ $('Tigger workflow when google sheets has new row added').item.json.linkedin_url }}
